## onPrimitiveTypeSelect() function

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function onPrimitiveTypeSelect<TResult>(type: PrimitiveType, selectors: {
    onBoolean: () => TResult;
    onNumerical: () => TResult;
    onAddress: () => TResult;
    onBytes: () => TResult;
    onString: () => TResult;
    onH256: () => TResult;
    onTokenIndetifier: () => TResult;
    onNothing: () => TResult;
    onOther?: () => TResult;
}): TResult;
```
